content: Wait a minute!!! Don’t you HAVE to show ID if you buy beer??? That has nothing to do with race, yet the state and Feds hold ALL people to this law. What about getting on a jet plane? That too is not a race issue. How about applying for a loan or Credit? Yep, ID is mandatory regardless of race. So when voting for the President of the USA? What happened??? And why is it an issue of race when the same rule would be enforced for ALL people, regardless of race. This is a stellar example stupidity at the highest level.
